summary: Sales professional with over 13 years of outside sales experience, territory management, and closing deals. Strong communicator with computer literacy; focused on driving sales, maximizing profits, and customer satisfaction. Experienced in managing sales teams and developing long-term client relationships.

experience.title: Sales Representative
experience.description: Increased sales volume by adding 10 accounts in the territory; negotiated prices and service agreements; contacted new and existing customers to discuss how their needs could be met through specific products and services.

experience.title: Territory Manager
experience.description: Established new territory; managed a portfolio of 30 accounts and $60,000-$90,000 in monthly sales; negotiated prices, terms, and service agreements; prospected and conducted face-to-face sales calls; built relationships to promote long-term growth; exceeded team sales goals by 30%.

experience.title: Sales
experience.description: Managed residential and commercial sales; retailed flooring and related products; coordinated installations; project estimating and purchasing; attended trade shows; negotiated prices and terms; identified prospective customers; wrote sales contracts.

experience.title: Owner
experience.description: Coordinated residential and commercial sales; supervised installations; project estimating and purchasing; negotiated prices and service agreements; attended trade shows; wrote sales contracts; supervised staff and managed client relationships.
